intro: Psychotria wernhamiana, commonly known as the Wernham's Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil and Colombia. The plant is characterized by its small, dark green leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It produces small, red berries that contain the seeds. Psychotria wernhamiana is often found in humid, shaded environments within tropical rainforests.
